= Introduction =

This extension point offers other plugins the ability to add new metrics to the metrics table that I provide. The extention point requires a class that implements the interface Metricable. This interface establishes that the class provided must have the name of the metric and how it is calculated.

= Details =
{{{
public interface Metricable {

	public String getMetricName();
	public double calculateMetric();
	
}

}}}
